title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 §§ 251-1.3 - Reports of use of physical force
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 §§ 251-1.3 - Reports of use of physical force

State Regulations
(a) An employee who has used physical force
on an inmate shall make a written report in prescribed form immediately to the
superintendent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
§§
251-1.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
